addUpdateClassMeta: MERGE (cm:class_meta {guidx:{guid}}) SET cm.labelx={label},cm.namex={name},cm.txt_search={txtSearch} RETURN cm.guidx as guid
searchFromText: MATCH (cm:class_meta) WHERE LOWER(cm.txt_search) CONTAINS LOWER({txtSearch}) RETURN cm.labelx as lbl,cm.namex as name,cm.guidx as guid
searchFromGraph: MATCH (n) WHERE LOWER(n.property_x) CONTAINS LOWER({propertyX}) AND NOT (n:class_meta) WITH labels(n)[0] as lbl,n.name as name,n.guid as guid WHERE lbl IS NOT NULL RETURN lbl,name,guid
getLabelName: MATCH (n:class_meta) WHERE n.guidx={guid} RETURN n.labelx AS lbl
